summary: AN ORDINANCE abandoning the unexpended and unencumbered balances in certain 1974 and prior appropriations made from the General, Park and Recreation, Library, Seattle Center, Emergency, City Street, Arterial City Street, General Arterial Improvement Bonds 1954, Seattle Park Improvement Bonds 1960, Seattle Sewer Improvement Bonds 1968,-Fire Protection Bonds 1968 - Stations and Shop, Fire Protection Bonds 1968 - Equipment, Arterial Development, Park Acquisition and Development, Neighborhood Improvement Bonds 1968, Municipal Sewer Bonds 1971 - Construction, Light, Water, Sewer, Solid Waste, Engineering Department Operating, Building Department Operating, General Services Operating, Public Health Revolving, Human Resources Operating Urban Renewal Operating, Community Development Operating, Employees' Retirement and Model Cities Funds.
